citation.title: Extended field intensity modulated radiation therapy for gynecologic cancers: Is the risk of duodenal toxicity high?

news.title: Extended-field IMRT does not increase duodenal toxicity risk

news.title: Extended-field IMRT does not increase risk of duodenal toxicity
news.summary: Women with cervical or endometrial cancer can safely receive extended-field intensity modulated radiation therapy (EF-IMRT) without increased risk of duodenal toxicity.
